title: Flamenco eggs
ingredients: ['350g potatoes, peeled and cut into small dice', '1 tbsp olive oil', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '3 mixed peppers (1 red, 1 green and 1 yellow), deseeded and thinly sliced', '2 courgettes, sliced', '6 tomatoes, about 400g in total, cut into chunks', '2 tbsp chopped fresh oregano', '4 large eggs']
